title: The Writer's Almanac - Monday, June 21, 2021
description: “Money may not buy happiness, but I'd rather cry in a Jaguar than on a bus.” -- French novelist and playwright Françoise Sagan, born this day in 1958.
itunes:author: Prairie Home Productions
itunes:subtitle: “Money may not buy happiness, but I'd rather cry in a Jaguar than on a bus.” -- French novelist and playwright Françoise Sagan, born this day in 1958.
